title: Brad Pitt looks MUCH slimmer in shock new pictures after split from Angelina Jolie
text:

Brad Pitt is looking very thin these days. 
The recently reclusive actor was spotted out and about in Los Angeles, looking like he's lost quite a lot of weight. 
The 53-year-old Fight Club star looked much slimmer as he arrived at a studio in LA on Wednesday. 
It could be a case of the bitter custody battle between Brad and ex-wife Angelina Jolie over their six children taking its toll. 
Brad has locked himself away since his public divorce from the Tomb Raider actress, 41. Read More Brad is looking pretty thin these days (Photo: Coleman-Rayner) He was spotted out and about in LA (Photo: Coleman-Rayner) 
These latest snaps have raised concern for the star, whose skeletal physique is a far cry from his muscly figure in his role as Achilles in Troy. 
Angelina and Brad are at loggerheads over who will have custody of their children Maddox, 15, Pax, 13, Zahara, 12, Shiloh, 10, and eight year-old twins Knox and Vivienne Jolie-Pitt.
